alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 4:42PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Idaho, northeastern Clearwater, south central Mineral and southwestern Missoula Counties through 515 PM MDT/415 PM PDT/... At 442 PM MDT/342 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 27 miles east of Pierce, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Idaho, northeastern Clearwater, south central Mineral and southwestern Missoula Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains
